short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the companion extension for Marks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Marks extension unlocks your TikTok bookmarks. Say goodbye to the days of searching aimlessly in TikTok to show something to a friend. Look it up on Marks immediately. This extension is the companion to the website and allows Marks to interface with TikTok on your behalf. It will collect your TikTok bookmarks and send them to Marks to be processed for search at another time.
